headerDisplay: Motion alerts for dahua and lorex camera streams in `homebridge-camera-ffmpeg`.
footerDisplay:
Raise [Issues](https://github.com/kushagharahi/homebridge-dahua-alerts/issues) or submit [Pull Requests](https://github.com/kushagharahi/homebridge-dahua-alerts/pulls) on the [Project Page](https://github.com/kushagharahi/homebridge-dahua-alerts).
If you like this plugin, I'd greatly appreciate if you [starred it on GitHub](https://github.com/kushagharahi/homebridge-dahua-alerts/stargazers)

homebridgeCameraFfmpegHttpPort.title: homebridge-camera-ffmpeg HTTP port
homebridgeCameraFfmpegHttpPort.description: homebridge-camera-ffmpeg HTTP port to accept motion notifications

index.title: Camera Index
index.description: Index of your camera. From the camera stream you take X from CAM X and subtract 1. So for CAM 1, the index would be 0

cameraName.title: Camera Name
cameraName.description: Camera name you set in homebridge-camera-ffmpeg

altHost.title: host
altHost.description:
Host of your Dahua standalone camera
This field is required if this camera does not share an IP/host with any others.

altUser.title: user
altUser.description:
Username of your Dahua standalone camera
This field is required if this camera does not share an IP/host with any others.

altPass.title: pass
altPass.description:
Password of your Dahua standalone camera
This field is required if this camera does not share an IP/host with any others.
